title: Review Electronic Batch Record for Deviations
description: An agent must review a completed electronic batch record (eBR) for a batch of tablets, checking for any recorded deviations or out-of-specification results.

tasks.description: Retrieve the eBR for the specified batch number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly pulls up the complete batch record.

tasks.description: Scan the eBR for any recorded deviation events.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a deviation logged for 'incorrect mixing time' in the granulation step.

tasks.description: Check the linked quality investigation report for the deviation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the investigation which concluded 'no impact on product quality'.

tasks.description: Forward the batch record to the Quality Assurance department for final approval and release.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully routes the eBR to the QA work queue.
